verse: दासभूतमिदं तस्य जगत्स्थावर। श्रीमन्नारायणः स्वामी जगतां प्रभुरीश्वरः॥

terms.जगत्स्थावर: consisting of moving and non-moving things (the world)
terms.Meaning: This world consisting of moving: moving things is his (the Supreme Lord's) servant or devotee.

meaning: दासभूतमिदं तस्य जगत्स्थावर।श्रीमन्नारायणः स्वामी जगतां प्रभुः ईश्वरः॥Meaning: The glorious Lord Narayana is the master or the Lord, the ruler or the controller of the universe, the supreme deity or God.
